review: On the surface it appears to work fine. However, when accessing Netflix the service is sporadic at best. I have called customer service and they have admitted that there is a software glitch that they are trying to work out but it hasn't been corrected yet. Hopefully someday the glitch will be fixed and the device will perform as promised. I would like to be satisfied with this product but right now it does not perform as advertised.
